name: Decred Pulse
description: Decred Pulse dashboard + full node (dcrd) combined in one Akash deployment. Includes a persistent full-node backend and a web UI.

env_vars.name: DCRD_RPC_PASS
env_vars.description: dcrd RPC password (dashboard uses this). Change this in production.

env_vars.name: DCRD_EXTRA_ARGS
env_vars.description: Additional command-line arguments for dcrd (optional, e.g. --txindex)
